p: Both essential oils demonstrated similar antioxidant activity increasing in a concentration-dependent manner, except for some small fluctuations at 2% (EO2 had slightly higher antioxidant activity compared to EO1) and 20% (EO2 antioxidant activity was slightly lower than EO1). Both essential oil preparations at 10% concentration had higher than 50% antioxidant activity (more than half of DPPH radicals were bound).
